content.rendered:
Hello. This is FOSS4G Asia Seoul team.
We would like to introduce the Open Mapping Hub (OMH) of HOT (Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team), our Bronze sponsor. HOT is an international team dedicated to humanitarian action and community development through open mapping. They work together to provide map data that revolutionizes disaster management, reduces risks, and contributes to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals. This sponsorship is part of the HOT OpenSummit23-24 program, and thanks to this support, we have been able to create a more diverse and vibrant community for FOSS4G Asia.

Thank you!
